lead_paragraph: The Pittsburgh Penguins were confident that three straight games without a point for Evgeni Malkin and a rare off night by Matt Murray were an aberration more than a concern.

headline.print_headline: Penguins Move to Brink of Title With 3-1 Win vs. Sharks
headline.main: Penguins Move to Brink of Title With 3-1 Win vs. Sharks

snippet: The Pittsburgh Penguins were confident that three straight games without a point for Evgeni Malkin and a rare off night by Matt Murray were an aberration more than a concern....
